sql-statement.sql: select * from sys_domain_info t where 1=1 and t.DOMAIN_UP_UUID != '#' order by t.modified_date desc
select * from sys_domain_info t where 1=1 and (t.domain_id = ? or domain_name = ?)
select * from sys_domain_info t where 1=1 and (t.domain_id = ? or domain_name = ?) and t.uuid <> ?
select t.UUID from sys_domain_info t where 1=1 and t.domain_up_uuid = '#'
